description: Darkdevil (Reilly Tyne) is a fictional character, a superhero in the "MC2" future of the Marvel Comics universe. He was created by Tom DeFalco and Pat Olliffe and first appeared in Spider-Girl #2. (November 1998)
name: Darkdevil
powers: Change his appearance from demon to human
Ability to turn any body part into flame
Ability to cling to any surface
turn any body part into flame
